remarks: Property 3 of a specially modified restriction of a linear combination in a vector space.  (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
lincresunit.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
lincresunit.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
lincresunit.e $e |- E = ( Base ` R ) $.
lincresunit.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
lincresunit.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
lincresunit.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) $.
lincresunit.n $e |- N = ( invg ` R ) $.
lincresunit.i $e |- I = ( invr ` R ) $.
lincresunit.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
lincresunit.g $e |- G = ( s e. ( S \ { X } ) |-> ( ( I ` ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) ) .x. ( F ` s ) ) ) $.
lincreslvec3 $p |- ( ( ( S e. ~P B /\ M e. LVec /\ X e. S ) /\ ( F e. ( E ^m S ) /\ ( F ` X ) =/= .0. /\ F finSupp .0. ) /\ ( F ( linC ` M ) S ) = Z ) -> ( G ( linC ` M ) ( S \ { X } ) ) = X ) $.
$d .0. s $.
$d .x. s $.
$d B s $.
$d E s $.
$d F s $.
$d G s $.
$d I s $.
$d M s $.
$d N s $.
